name: CURIUM
descr: [CURIUM](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1012) is an Iranian threat group, first reported in September 2019 and active since at least July 2018, targeting IT service providers in the Middle East.(Citation: Symantec Tortoiseshell 2019) [CURIUM](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1012) has since invested in building relationships with potential targets via social media over a period of months to establish trust and confidence before sending malware. Security researchers note [CURIUM](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1012) has demonstrated great patience and persistence by chatting with potential targets daily and sending benign files to help lower their security consciousness.(Citation: Microsoft Iranian Threat Actor Trends November 2021)

subtechniques.name: Domains
subtechniques.descr: [CURIUM](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1012) created domains to facilitate strategic website compromise and credential capture activities.(Citation: PWC Yellow Liderc 2023)

subtechniques.name: Virtual Private Server
subtechniques.descr: [CURIUM](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1012) created virtual private server instances to facilitate use of malicious domains and other items.(Citation: PWC Yellow Liderc 2023)

subtechniques.name: Server
subtechniques.descr: [CURIUM](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1012) has created dedicated servers for command and control and exfiltration purposes.(Citation: PWC Yellow Liderc 2023)

subtechniques.name: PowerShell
subtechniques.descr: [CURIUM](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1012) has leveraged PowerShell scripts for initial process execution and data gathering in victim environments.(Citation: Symantec Tortoiseshell 2019)

subtechniques.name: Web Services
subtechniques.descr: [CURIUM](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1012) has compromised legitimate websites to enable strategic website compromise attacks.(Citation: PWC Yellow Liderc 2023)

technique_table_data.name: Data from Local System
technique_table_data.descr: [CURIUM](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1012) has exfiltrated data from a compromised machine.(Citation: Microsoft Iranian Threat Actor Trends November 2021)

technique_table_data.name: Drive-by Compromise
technique_table_data.descr: [CURIUM](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1012) has used strategic website compromise to infect victims with malware such as [IMAPLoader](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1152).(Citation: PWC Yellow Liderc 2023)

subtechniques.name: Social Media Accounts
subtechniques.descr: [CURIUM](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1012) has established a network of fictitious social media accounts, including on Facebook and LinkedIn, to establish relationships with victims, often posing as an attractive woman.(Citation: Microsoft Iranian Threat Actor Trends November 2021)

subtechniques.name: Email Accounts
subtechniques.descr: [CURIUM](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1012) has created dedicated email accounts for use with tools such as [IMAPLoader](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1152).(Citation: PWC Yellow Liderc 2023)

subtechniques.name: Exfiltration Over Asymmetric Encrypted Non-C2 Protocol
subtechniques.descr: [CURIUM](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1012) has used SMTPS to exfiltrate collected data from victims.(Citation: PWC Yellow Liderc 2023)

technique_table_data.name: Exfiltration Over C2 Channel
technique_table_data.descr: [CURIUM](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1012) has used IMAP and SMTPS for exfiltration via tools such as [IMAPLoader](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1152).(Citation: PWC Yellow Liderc 2023)

subtechniques.name: Spearphishing Attachment
subtechniques.descr: [CURIUM](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1012) has used phishing with malicious attachments for initial access to victim environments.(Citation: PWC Yellow Liderc 2023)

subtechniques.name: Spearphishing via Service
subtechniques.descr: [CURIUM](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1012) has used social media to deliver malicious files to victims.(Citation: Microsoft Iranian Threat Actor Trends November 2021)

subtechniques.name: Spearphishing Link
subtechniques.descr: [CURIUM](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1012) used malicious links to adversary-controlled resources for credential harvesting.(Citation: PWC Yellow Liderc 2023)

subtechniques.name: Web Shell
subtechniques.descr: [CURIUM](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1012) has been linked to web shells following likely server compromise as an initial access vector into victim networks.(Citation: Symantec Tortoiseshell 2019)

subtechniques.name: Drive-by Target
subtechniques.descr: [CURIUM](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1012) used strategic website compromise to fingerprint then target victims.(Citation: PWC Yellow Liderc 2023)

technique_table_data.name: System Information Discovery
technique_table_data.descr: [CURIUM](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1012) deploys information gathering tools focused on capturing IP configuration, running application, system information, and network connectivity information.(Citation: Symantec Tortoiseshell 2019)

technique_table_data.name: System Time Discovery
technique_table_data.descr: [CURIUM](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1012) deployed mechanisms to check system time information following strategic website compromise attacks.(Citation: PWC Yellow Liderc 2023)

subtechniques.name: Malicious File
subtechniques.descr: [CURIUM](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1012) has lured users into opening malicious files delivered via social media.(Citation: Microsoft Iranian Threat Actor Trends November 2021)

software_data.name: IMAPLoader
software_data.descr: [IMAPLoader](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1152) was deployed by [CURIUM](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1012) as a post-exploitation payload from strategic website compromise.(Citation: PWC Yellow Liderc 2023)

alias_descriptions.name: TA456
alias_descriptions.descr: (Citation: Microsoft Threat Actor Naming July 2023)(Citation: Proofpoint TA456 Defense Contractor July 2021)
